message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.RO 

The paper deals with video forecasting of human activity, which involves computer vision and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel architecture for predicting human poses and rendering target appearances, which involves deep learning techniques. Hence, it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper deals with video processing and manipulation, which could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper's proposed approach could have applications in robotics, which could place it under cs.RO (Robotics).
